downloadTitle: Integration Points: Project Management and Accounting and Other Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Modules White Paper
downloadDescription: This document provides an overview of the ways that the Project management and accounting module and other modules in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 integrate and connect with one another.
